inkball

类 BallManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • inkball.BallManager

  • public class BallManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The BallManager class manages a list of all ball colors of the level. It allows adding, removing, and retrieving colors from the list.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      BallManager(java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> initialColors)
      Constructor for the BallManager class.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addColor(java.lang.String color)
      Adds a new ball to the list of ball.
      java.lang.String getColor(int index)
      Retrieves the color at the specified index.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRemainingBallColors()
      Retrieves a list of remaining ball colors.
      void removeColorAt(int index)
      Removes the color at the specified index.
      int size()
      Gets the number of colors currently managed by the BallManager.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BallManager

        public BallManager(java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> initialColors)
        Constructor for the BallManager class. Initializes the ball manager with a list of initial colors.
        参数:
        initialColors - A list of colors to initialize the ball manager.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getColor

        public java.lang.String getColor(int index)
        Retrieves the color at the specified index.
        参数:
        index - The index of the color to retrieve.
        返回:
        The color at the specified index, or an error message if out of bounds.

      • removeColorAt

        public void removeColorAt(int index)
        Removes the color at the specified index.
        参数:
        index - The index of the color to remove.

      • size

        public int size()
        Gets the number of colors currently managed by the BallManager.
        返回:
        The number of ball colors in the list.

      • getRemainingBallColors

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRemainingBallColors()
        Retrieves a list of remaining ball colors.
        返回:
        A list of remaining ball colors.

      • addColor

        public void addColor(java.lang.String color)
        Adds a new ball to the list of ball.
        参数:
        color - The color to add to the list.
